item.title: How to create Hugo blog on Github Pages Using Windows
item.description: Hugo blog is becoming one of the most popular static site generators. The first time I used it, it blew me away by how easy it was to set up a blog on my local machine. It is also very easy to publish your hugo site to Github Pages for free. In this tutorial, I am going to show you how to set up your Hugo blog on Github Pages. We would be using this theme.
